snippet: A man who let his 5-year-old daughter and his 3-year-old son shoot illegal weapons in a Queens park faces reckless endangerment and other charges.
abstract: Queens resident Zbigniew Pawlowski is charged with reckless endangerment after allowing his 5-year-old daughter and his 3-year-old son to play with loaded BB guns in Ditmars Park in Astoria.
lead_paragraph: A man who let his 5-year-old daughter and his 3-year-old son shoot illegal weapons in a Queens park faces reckless endangerment and other charges.

headline.seo: Man Is Arrested After Letting His Children Fire BB Guns
headline.main: Father Held for Letting His Children Fire BB Guns
headline.print_headline: Father Held For Letting His Children Fire BB Guns
